task.name: rerefant

param.name: caltable
param.shortdescription: Output calibration table (overwrite tablein if unspecified)
param.description: Output calibration table (overwrite tablein if unspecified)

task.example:
TBD...
Keyword arguments: vis -- Name of input visibility file default: none; example: vis='ngc5921.ms' tablein -- Input calibration table (G or T) default: none; example: tablein='ngc5921.gcal' caltable -- Output calibration table default: '' (will overwrite tablein); example: caltable='ngc5921_newrefant.gcal' refantmode -- The phase refant algorithm to use default: 'flex'; example: refantmode='flex' Options: 'flex','strict' refant -- Reference antenna name(s); a prioritized list may be specified default: '' => no refant applied example: refant='4' (antenna with index 4) refant='VA04' (VLA antenna #4) refant='EA02,EA23,EA13' (EVLA antenna EA02, use EA23 and EA13 as alternates if/when EA02 drops out) Use taskname=listobs for antenna listing
